info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 10 at 4:56PM MDT until July 10 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Sherman County in northwestern Kansas...
* Until 600 PM MDT.
* At 456 PM MDT, a dust channel was near Ruleton, moving east at 25 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Public. A report of less than one half mile visibility in dust 9 miles south of Ruleton.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
*
This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 8 and 35.
Locations impacted include... Goodland, Ruleton, and Edson.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
To report severe weather, contact the National Weather Service, or your nearest law enforcement agency, who will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 10 at 4:56PM MDT until July 10 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland KS

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
